bug.summary: Pretrain CLI, different seeding not possible
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
Passing a parameter to -s or --seed exposes the error. E.g. python -m spacy pretrain data/lm/de.train.jsonl de_core_news_md lm_models/de -s 42. The error is: <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "mtrand.pyx", line 678, in mtrand.RandomState.seed TypeError: 'float' object cannot be interpreted as an integer </denchmark-code>
The seed parameter should be typed as int here:
spaCy/spacy/cli/pretrain.py
Line 36 in e703301
seed=("Seed for random number generators", "option", "s", float),
